message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

This paper focuses on a vision-language task of grounding referring expressions in images, which involves both visual and textual context modeling. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). However, the paper also proposes a variational Bayesian method to solve the problem, which falls under the sub-categories of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper involves natural language processing and comprehension, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). Finally, the paper also involves information retrieval, as it aims to retrieve the correct referent from the image based on the given referring expression, which falls under the sub-category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
